act_pit.actname: McLeod Lake Indian Band Treaty No. 8 Adhesion and Settlement Agreement Act

change.changenote: Sections 3 (3) and (4) were added by 2002-31-1, effective May 9, 2002 (Royal Assent).
Section 10 BEFORE repealed by 2000-8-10(3), effective March 31, 2001 (Royal Assent).

subsection.subsectiontext: This section is repealed on March 31, 2001.
